name: Dragonbane Greatsword
description: A massive two-handed blade forged from dragonscale steel with runes that glow red-hot when near draconic enemies. The crossguard resembles dragon wings.
flavor_text: Even the mightiest wyrm fears this edge.

name: Moonkissed Rapier
description: An elegant dueling sword with a blade that shimmers like moonlight on water. The ornate hilt is wrapped in silver wire and topped with a crescent moon pommel.

name: Stormbreaker Warhammer
description: A mighty two-handed hammer whose head crackles with perpetual lightning. Thor himself would envy this weapon's power to split the very sky.

name: Whisperwind Bow
description: A recurved bow carved from ancient yew with silver inlays that catch the light. Arrows fired from it make no sound as they find their mark.

name: Bloodthirster Battleaxe
description: A vicious double-headed axe with a crimson blade that seems to pulse with its own heartbeat. The weapon grows stronger with each enemy felled.
flavor_text: It hungers for more than victory.

name: Frostbite Dagger
description: A slender blade of eternal ice that never melts, wrapped in leather that remains warm to the touch. Wounds from this weapon freeze from within.

name: Soulrend Scythe
description: A curved reaping blade attached to a bone-white shaft carved with necromantic symbols. The weapon seems to whisper names of the recently departed.

name: Starfall Crossbow
description: A mechanical crossbow with celestial bronze mechanisms and crystal focusing lenses. Bolts fired from it streak like falling stars.

name: Thornsnarl Mace
description: A brutal weapon with a head carved from living wood that sprouts sharp thorns. Vines wrap around the handle and bloom with poisonous flowers.

name: Flamebrand Falchion
description: A curved sword with a blade that burns with perpetual flame yet never consumes itself. The heat radiates warmth even in the coldest dungeons.

name: Windcutter Katana
description: A masterwork blade folded a thousand times with an edge sharp enough to slice through gusts of wind itself. The scabbard bears storm cloud patterns.

name: Earthshaker Maul
description: A colossal two-handed hammer with a head carved from a single boulder. Each strike creates minor tremors that can topple stone walls.
flavor_text: The ground trembles at its approach.

name: Shadowstrike Shortsword
description: A black blade that seems to absorb light around it with a hilt wrapped in midnight silk. The weapon phases partially out of reality during attacks.

name: Voidpierce Spear
description: A long weapon with a spearhead forged from meteoric metal that gleams with otherworldly darkness. The shaft bears runic inscriptions in forgotten tongues.
flavor_text: From beyond the stars it came.

name: Crystalshard Longsword
description: A blade made from a single piece of enchanted crystal that refracts light into rainbow patterns. The edge remains impossibly sharp despite its fragile appearance.

name: Heartseeker Crossbow
description: A compact crossbow designed for precision strikes with mechanisms crafted from silver and gold. Each bolt is fletched with phoenix feathers.

name: Runebreaker Mace
description: A weapon whose head is inscribed with counter-magic runes that glow when near enchanted items. The handle is wrapped in leather from magical beasts.

name: Doomcleaver Axe
description: A single-bladed weapon with a crescent edge that seems to devour light itself. The weapon grows heavier with each life it claims.

name: Gossamer Blade
description: An impossibly thin sword that appears to be made of crystallized air with a cutting edge finer than any mortal smith could achieve.

name: Oathkeeper Shield
description: A tower shield bearing the crests of fallen knights with a surface that reflects the honor of its wielder. It has never been broken in combat.
